name: Developing Applications with Google Cloud: Foundations
description: In this course, you learn the fundamentals of application development on Google Cloud. You learn best practices for cloud applications, and how to select compute and data options to match your application use cases. You're introduced to generative AI and how it's used to help build applications. You learn about authentication and authorization, application deployment, continuous integration and delivery, and monitoring and performance tuning for your applications running in Google Cloud. U...
teaches: Discuss best practices for application development in the cloud.
Understand how to choose the appropriate data storage option for application use cases.
Use authentication and authorization to secure an application.
Describe use cases for the different Google Cloud compute options used for running applications.

modules.title: Introduction
modules.description: Welcome to "Developing Applications with Google Cloud: Foundations." This course introduces you to best practices for cloud applications and how to select compute and data options to match application use cases. You learn about Google services for continuous integration and delivery, how to deploy your applications, and how to monitor your applications as they run in Google Cloud. You also learn how Google Cloud helps you build authentication, authorization, security, and artificial intelligence into your applications. Through a combination of lectures, hands-on labs, and supplemental materials, you will learn the fundamentals of application development in Google Cloud.

modules.title: Best Practices for Cloud Application Development
modules.description: This module introduces best practices for developing applications that run in the cloud.

activities.title: Best Practices for Cloud Application Development (1)
Best Practices for Cloud Application Development (2)
Quiz: Best Practices for Cloud Application Development

modules.title: Getting Started with Google Cloud Development
modules.description: This module introduces the different Google Cloud tools that you will use to develop your applications.

activities.title: Cloud APIs and the Google Cloud SDK
Quiz: Getting Started with Google Cloud Development

modules.title: Data Storage Options
modules.description: This module compares the data storage and database services provided by Google Cloud.

activities.title: Developing Applications with Google Cloud: Storing Application Data
activities.description: In this lab, you create a bookshelf application written in Python. You update the application to use Cloud Client Libraries to store book data in a Firestore database. You also use Cloud Client Libraries to upload book cover images to a Cloud Storage bucket.

modules.title: Handling Authentication and Authorization
modules.description: This module explains how authentication and authorization are added to your cloud applications.

activities.title: Authenticating to Google APIs and Service Accounts

modules.title: Adding Intelligence to Your Application
modules.description: This module discusses how pre-trained machine learning APIs and generative AI can improve your cloud applications.

activities.title: Developing Applications on Google Cloud: Adding User Authentication and Intelligence to Your Application
activities.description: In this lab, you add user authentication and user profiles to a Python application. You also use Secret Manager to store sensitive application data, and use a Google Cloud machine learning API to add a feature to the application.

activities.title: Quiz: Adding Intelligence to Your Application

modules.title: Deploying Applications
modules.description: This module discusses how to build and deploy applications on Google Cloud.

modules.title: Compute Options for Your Application
modules.description: This module discusses the compute options available for running your applications in Google Cloud.

activities.title: Quiz: Compute Options for Your Application

modules.title: Monitoring and Performance Tuning
modules.description: This module discusses the application use cases of the services in Google Cloud Observability.

activities.title: Developing Applications on Google Cloud: Deploying and Maintaining Your Application
activities.description: In this lab, you containerize a Python application and deploy it to Cloud Run. You also explore tools in Google Cloud's operations suite that can help you maintain the health of your application.
